about.abouttext2: Lorson Ranch represents the pride and quality of homeownership and homebuilding in Colorado Springs. This 1,400 acre community is located in southeast Colorado Springs at Marksheffel Road & Fontaine Boulevard. This planned community offers a high standard of living coupled with affordability and diversity with home prices ranging from the low $200s to the mid $300s.  Lorson Ranch is advantageously located at the epicenter of military operations; located 6 miles southwest of Schriever Air Force Base, 4 miles south of Peterson Air Force Base, 6 miles south east of the Colorado Springs Airport, and 5 miles east of Ft. Carson Military Reservation.
